doc:
Bryan Greenberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bryan_Greenberg 0 Bryan Greenberg (born May 24, 1978) is an American actor and singer, known for his starring role as Ben Epstein in the HBO original series How to Make It in America as well as a recurring role as Jake Jagielski in the WB series One Tree Hill and as Nick Garrett on the short-lived ABC drama October Road. His film work includes The Perfect Score, Prime, Nobel Son, Bride Wars, The Good Guy, Friends with Benefits, and A Short History of Decay. Bryan_Greenberg ( born May_24 , 1978 ) is an_American_actor_and_singer , known for his_starring_role as Ben_Epstein in the_HBO_original_series How to_Make It in America_as_well_as a_recurring_role as Jake_Jagielski in the_WB_series_One_Tree_Hill and as Nick_Garrett on the_short-lived_ABC_drama_October_Road . His_film_work includes The_Perfect_Score , Prime , Nobel_Son , Bride_Wars , The_Good_Guy , Friends with Benefits , and A_Short_History of Decay .
